statements.query: MATCH (distribution:AWSCloudfrontDistribution)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE EXISTS(distribution.exposed_internet) WITH distribution LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE distribution.exposed_internet, distribution.exposed_internet_type, distribution.publicContext return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (distribution:AWSCloudfrontDistribution)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE 'allow-all' in distribution.viewer_protocol_policy SET distribution.exposed_internet = true ,(CASE WHEN NOT 'cloudfront_viewer_protocol_policy' IN coalesce(distribution.exposed_internet_type , []) THEN distribution END).exposed_internet_type = coalesce(distribution.exposed_internet_type , []) + 'cloudfront_viewer_protocol_policy';

MATCH (distribution:AWSCloudfrontDistribution)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE distribution.exposed_internet = true WITH distribution SET distribution.publicContext = apoc.convert.toJson([{resource: distribution.id, resourceType: 'aws-cloudfront-distribution', context: [{distributionId: distribution.id, domainName: distribution.domainname, status: distribution.status, viewerProtocolPolicy: distribution.viewer_protocol_policy, exposureTypes: distribution.exposed_internet_type, aliases: coalesce(distribution.aliases, []), enabled: coalesce(distribution.enabled, false)}]}])
